code: import React from"react";import{NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import"./Paginator.css";import leftArrowImg from"../../assets/img/leftArrow.gif";import rightArrowImg from"../../assets/img/rightArrow.gif";import cn from"classnames";var Paginator=function Paginator(props){var portionSize=props.portionSize,totalItemsCount=props.totalItemsCount,itemsOnPage=props.itemsOnPage,url=props.url,pageNumber=props.pageNumber,portionNumber=props.portionNumber;var totalPages=Math.ceil(totalItemsCount/itemsOnPage);var totalPortions=Math.ceil(totalPages/portionSize);var lastPageButton=portionNumber*portionSize;var firstPageButton=lastPageButton-portionSize+1;var pages=[];for(var i=1;i<=totalPages;i++){pages.push(i);}return React.createElement("div",{className:props.paginatorClass},React.createElement("div",{className:cn(props.leftButtonClass,portionNumber===1&&"is-deactivated"),onClick:portionNumber>1?function(){return props.portionControl(false);}:null},React.createElement("img",{src:leftArrowImg})),React.createElement("ul",null,pages.map(function(p){if(p>=firstPageButton&&p<=lastPageButton){var newUrl=url.replace('$pageNumber$',p);return React.createElement("li",{key:p},React.createElement(NavLink,{className:cn(+pageNumber===p&&"present-page"),to:newUrl},p));}})),React.createElement("div",{className:cn(props.rightButtonClass,portionNumber===totalPortions&&"is-deactivated"),onClick:portionNumber<totalPortions?function(){return props.portionControl(true);}:null},React.createElement("img",{src:rightArrowImg})));};export default Paginator;
